name: Mina Mangkukulam
description:
In the Mystical campus of Anting Academy. A young witch by the name of Mina has Prepared a special plan to pass her potions class with flying colors.

Unfortunately, she forgot  to bring her Ingredients to school.  can Mina regather all of her Ingredients again before her she runs out of time?

Mina Mangkukulam is a retro RPG in the style of Old Point and Click adventure games. set in a somewhat Halloween themed school setting with many tropes, references and callouts to Philippine culture and mythology.

Game length can range between 30 minutes to an hour and 30 minutes.

------Controls------

Movement - Arrow keys

Confirm/Interact - Z

Cancel/Menu - X

Skip Text /Dash- Shift

------Credits------

--Music--

Spook 2 and 5 by Peritune

Tiptoes by Myuu

--RPGMaker Plugins---

Yanfly, Galv, SRD, DAE, and Himeworks 

for the majority of the main plugins used in the game
